item.title: DSGE and the real estate market
item.description: Back in 2009, for my master’s thesis I decided to apply a DSGE model to analyze the real state market prices in Argentina.

item.title: Non-linear dynamics and chaos in the foreign exchange market
item.description: My degree thesis, tons of fun, a while ago.
